name: Nature`s Secrets Carrot Face Wash
description: Rich in scientifically proven natural anti-oxidants, it’s your secret to discovering the natural beauty of your skin and gaining fresh radiance. Revitalize your skin, restoring essential moisture and preventing dryness. Skin Friendly at pH 5.5-6.0 and 100% soap free.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
